H2.text: which countries speak german officially. Switzerland

H3.text: which countries speak german officially. Canada

A4.text: German is the official language of the following countries: Germany, Austria, 17 cantons of Switzerland, Liechtenstein.

A5.text: The four national languages of Switzerland are German, French, Italian, and Romansh.

A6.text: German, French, and Italian maintain equal status as official languages at the national level within the federal administration of the Swiss Confederation.
